actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Resolution to provide assistance to Lebanon and appealing for a cease-fire.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Government and people of the United States welcome a new President by the Assembly of Lebonan. Welcomes the President's request for funds to assist in the relief of victims of the armed strife in the nation. Urges the President to declare the willingness of the United States to participate in multilateral assistance programs to help in the reconstruction of Lebanon. Encourages a ceasefire in Lebanon.

titles.title: Resolution to provide assistance to Lebanon and appealing for a cease-fire.
